EmailTemplate.subject: Will we see you tomorrow at the Fast Casual Executive Summit?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're excited to be part of this unique virtual event and look forward to showing you how NCR delivers digital-first solutions that help restaurants connect with their guests, along with services that help simplify operations and reduce costs.
Join us on Wednesday, October 21 at 3:30 p.m. EST for 'Getting Down to Business with Contactlessâ€˜ <[[https://fastcasualsummit.com/agenda/getting-down-to-business-with-contactless/]]> with Dirk Izzo, president and general manager of NCR Hospitality, as he speaks with leaders in the restaurant industry about contactless technology and how brands have reimagined the customer experience during a year of accelerated transformation. Gain insights from executives of Firehouse Subs, Ballard Brands and Fazoli's Restaurant Group on incorporating contactless experiences into their restaurants without straining business operations.
Also, stop by our virtual booth in the expo hall to see how NCR solutions can help you run your fast casual and quick service brand from end to end.
We look forward to engaging with you over the next few days.
